Default content: Heather Navy Active Comfort Full Zip Hoodie
Translated content: Heather Navy Active Comfort Full Zip Hoodie

Default content:
If you’re only bringing one hoodie, this is your guy. Lounging to long travel days, do it all in an ultra-soft active fabric packed with 4-way stretch, quick dry, and moisture-wicking performance features. And with a perfect fit in the arms and shoulders, you’ll look like you just hit a workout – no weights required.

 

Features:

  • Perfect fit
  • Ultra-soft
  • 4-way stretch
  • Quick dry and moisture-wicking
  • UPF 50+ sun protection
  • Auto-lock zipper for secure, noiseless closure
  • 2 front pockets
  • Hood with adjustable drawcord
  • 89% Polyester/ 11% Spandex

 Fit:

  • Slim fit through arms and shoulders
  • Room through the body
  • Model is 6'2" and wearing size L
Translated content:
Si vous n'apportez qu'un seul sweat à capuche, c'est votre homme. Détendez-vous pendant les longues journées de voyage, faites tout cela dans un tissu actif ultra doux doté de caractéristiques de performance extensibles dans 4 directions, à séchage rapide et évacuant l'humidité. Et avec un ajustement parfait au niveau des bras et des épaules, vous aurez l'impression de venir tout juste de vous entraîner – aucun poids n'est requis.

 

Caractéristiques:

  • Ajustement parfait
  • Ultra-doux
  • Étirement dans 4 directions
  • Séchage rapide et évacuation de l'humidité
  • Protection solaire UPF 50+
  • Fermeture éclair à verrouillage automatique pour une fermeture sécurisée et silencieuse
  • 2 poches avant
  • Capuche avec cordon de serrage réglable
  • 89 % polyester/ 11 % élasthanne

 Ajuster:

  • Coupe ajustée au niveau des bras et des épaules
  • Espace à travers le corps
  • Le mannequin mesure 6'2" et porte une taille L

The anytime, anywhere comfort of our best-selling joggers meets a straight leg, relaxed fit. Sweat, lounge, or run errands – our Do It All Pant brings the performance of your favorite activewear to our softest 4-way stretch fabric.

 

Features:

  • Ultra-soft.
  • 4-way stretch.
  • Quick dry and moisture-wicking.
  • UPF 50+ sun protection.
  • 2 front pockets.
  • 1 back zipper pocket.
  • 89% Polyester/ 11% Spandex.

 Fit:

  • Straight fit, relaxed through the legs.
  • Model is 6'0" and wearing size M.
Translated content:
Le confort à tout moment et en tout lieu de nos pantalons de jogging les plus vendus rencontre une jambe droite et une coupe décontractée. Transpirez, détendez-vous ou faites des courses – notre pantalon Do It All apporte la performance de vos vêtements de sport préférés à notre tissu extensible dans 4 directions le plus doux.

 

Caractéristiques:

  • Ultra-doux.
  • Extensible dans 4 directions.
  • Séchage rapide et évacuation de l'humidité.
  • Protection solaire UPF 50+.
  • 2 poches avant.
  • 1 poche arrière zippée.
  • 89 % polyester/ 11 % élasthanne.

 Ajuster:

  • Coupe droite, décontractée au niveau des jambes.
  • Le mannequin mesure 6'0" et porte une taille M.

The comfort of a sweat pant, the durability of a work pant – with the polished look of our best-selling chinos. The 24/7 Commuter Pant does it all, designed with a lightweight performance fabric and 4-way stretch for around-the-clock comfort. Travel-friendly and tough enough to withstand your busiest days, this overachiever moves from long days to late nights with ease.

  • 4-way stretch
  • Ultra-soft

  • 47% Nylon/47% Viscose/6% Spandex

  • 33” inseam
  • Size up for a looser fit

  • Carbon

Features:

  • High performance technical fabric
  • 4-way stretch
  • Ultra-soft
  • Lightweight and breathable
  • UPF 50+ sun protection
  • 6 pockets
  • Invisible zipper on 1 front and back pocket for a secure carry
  • 47% Nylon/47% Viscose/6% Spandex

Fit: 

  • Slim fit with tapered leg
  • 33” inseam
  • Size up for a looser fit

  • Black
  • Navy
  • Carbon
  • Khaki
  • Sandstone

Le pantalon Commuter 24/7 fait tout, conçu avec un tissu léger et performant et extensible dans 4 directions pour un confort 24 heures sur 24. Adapté aux voyages et suffisamment robuste pour résister à vos journées les plus chargées, ce surperformant passe facilement des longues journées aux soirées tardives.

Default content:
No bunching, no riding up. With a ridiculously soft micromodal fabric and innovative flyless 3D pouch for maximum support, you’ll never want to go commando again. Our favorite part? Its stretchy, ultra-comfortable elastic waistband that won’t dig or slip.

 

Feature:

  • Modern, flattering fit
  • Ultra-soft 
  • Screen-printed no-itch tag
  • Flyless 3D pouch constructed separately from the body with two seams around the crotch and one in the center for support
  • 92% micromodal / 8% elastane

Fit:

  • Form fitting with plenty of room to stretch
  • Stretchy elastane waistband
  • S: 30” waist - 5 1/2” inseam
  • M: 33” waist - 5 3/4” inseam
  • L: 36” waist - 6” inseam
  • XL: 40” waist - 6 1/4” inseam
  • 2XL: 44” waist - 6 1/2” inseam

    Colors Included in Pack: 

    • Black x 9
Translated content:
Pas de regroupement, pas de remontée. Avec un tissu micromodal ridiculement doux et une pochette 3D innovante sans mouche pour un soutien maximal, vous ne voudrez plus jamais devenir commando. Notre partie préférée ? Sa ceinture élastique extensible et ultra confortable qui ne creuse ni ne glisse.

Fonctionnalité:

  • Coupe moderne et flatteuse
  • Ultra-doux
  • Étiquette anti-démangeaison sérigraphiée
  • Pochette 3D sans mouche construite séparément du corps avec deux coutures autour de l'entrejambe et une au centre pour le soutien
  • 92% micromodal / 8% élasthanne

Ajuster:

  • Ajustement avec beaucoup d'espace pour s'étirer
  • Ceinture extensible en élasthanne
  • S : taille 30" - entrejambe 5 1/2"
  • M : 33" taille - 5 3/4" entrejambe
  • L : 36" taille - 6" entrejambe
  • XL : taille 40" - entrejambe 6 1/4"
  • 2XL : taille 44" - entrejambe 6 1/2"

    Couleurs incluses dans le pack :

    • Noir x9

Default content:
The comfort of a sweatpant, the durability of a work pant – with the polished look of our best-selling chinos. The 24/7 Commuter Pant does it all, designed with a lightweight performance fabric and 4-way stretch for around-the-clock comfort. Travel-friendly and tough enough to withstand your busiest days, this overachiever moves from long days to late nights with ease.

Features:

  • High performance technical fabric
  • 4-way stretch
  • Ultra-soft
  • Lightweight and breathable
  • UPF 50+ sun protection
  • 6 pockets
  • Invisible zipper on 1 front and back pocket for a secure carry
  • 47% Nylon/47% Viscose/6% Spandex

Fit: 

  • Slim fit with tapered leg
  • 34” inseam
  • Size up for a looser fit
Translated content:
Le confort d'un pantalon de survêtement, la durabilité d'un pantalon de travail – avec le look raffiné de nos chinos les plus vendus. Le pantalon Commuter 24/7 fait tout, conçu avec un tissu léger et performant et extensible dans 4 directions pour un confort 24 heures sur 24. Adapté aux voyages et suffisamment robuste pour résister à vos journées les plus chargées, ce surperformant passe facilement des longues journées aux soirées tardives.

Caractéristiques:

  • Tissu technique haute performance
  • Étirement dans 4 directions
  • Ultra-doux
  • Léger et respirant
  • Protection solaire UPF 50+
  • 6 poches
  • Fermeture éclair invisible sur 1 poche avant et arrière pour un transport sécurisé
  • 47 % nylon/47 % viscose/6 % élasthanne

Ajuster:

  • Coupe slim avec jambe fuselée
  • Entrejambe de 34 pouces
  • Taille au-dessus pour une coupe plus ample

Default content: Make your move with our Comfort Jeans Collection. A super soft, stretchy slim-fit, for the ultimate feel-good experience.
Translated content: Faites votre déménagement avec notre collection Comfort Jeans. Une coupe slim super douce et extensible, pour une expérience de bien-être ultime.

Default content:
If you’re only bringing one hoodie, this is your guy. Lounging to long travel days, do it all in an ultra-soft active fabric packed with 4-way stretch, quick dry, and moisture-wicking performance features. And with a perfect fit in the arms and shoulders, you’ll look like you just hit a workout – no weights required.

 

Features:

  • Perfect fit
  • Ultra-soft
  • 4-way stretch
  • Quick dry and moisture-wicking
  • UPF 50+ sun protection
  • Auto-lock zipper for secure, noiseless closure
  • 2 front pockets
  • Hood with adjustable drawcord
  • 89% Polyester/ 11% Spandex

 Fit:

  • Slim fit through arms and shoulders
  • Room through the body
  • Model is 6'2" and wearing size L

Colors Included in Pack: 

  • Black
  • Heather Navy
  • Charcoal Heather Gray
Translated content:
Si vous n'apportez qu'un seul sweat à capuche, c'est votre homme. Détendez-vous pendant les longues journées de voyage, faites tout cela dans un tissu actif ultra doux doté de caractéristiques de performance extensibles dans 4 directions, à séchage rapide et évacuant l'humidité. Et avec un ajustement parfait au niveau des bras et des épaules, vous aurez l'impression de venir tout juste de vous entraîner – aucun poids n'est requis.

 

Caractéristiques:

  • Ajustement parfait
  • Ultra-doux
  • Étirement dans 4 directions
  • Séchage rapide et évacuation de l'humidité
  • Protection solaire UPF 50+
  • Fermeture éclair à verrouillage automatique pour une fermeture sécurisée et silencieuse
  • 2 poches avant
  • Capuche avec cordon de serrage réglable
  • 89 % polyester/ 11 % élasthanne

 Ajuster:

  • Coupe ajustée au niveau des bras et des épaules
  • Espace à travers le corps
  • Le mannequin mesure 6'2" et porte une taille L

Couleurs incluses dans le pack :

  • Noir
  • Marine chiné
  • Charbon Gris Chiné

Features:    

  • High performance technical fabric
  • 4-way stretch
  • Lightweight and breathable
  • Quick-dry and moisture-wicking
  • Anti-odor
  • No-itch, screen printed tag

Fit: 

  • Slim fit through the body

Move without limits. These ultra-light training shorts offer maximum comfort and light-as-air breathability through your toughest workouts. Designed with cooling vent panels, 4-way stretch, and an unlined sweat-wicking performance fabric, they keep their cool under pressure so you can keep moving.

 

 Features:    

  • Perforated panels for breathability
  • High-stretch comfort waistband
  • High performance quick-dry fabric
  • 4-way stretch
  • Zippered pockets for a secure carry
  • UPF 50+ sun protection
  • 7” length for optimal movement

Fit: 

  • Roomy in thighs and glutes for limitless movement
  • 7” inseam
  • Fits true to size; size up for a roomier fit
  • 90% Polyester/10% Spandex

    Colors Included in Pack: 

    • Black
    • Carbon
    • Sandstone

Caractéristiques:

  • Panneaux perforés pour la respirabilité
  • Ceinture confort hautement extensible

  • Protection solaire UPF 50+
  • Longueur de 7" pour un mouvement optimal

Conçus avec des panneaux d'aération rafraîchissants, une extensibilité dans 4 directions et un tissu performant non doublé qui évacue la transpiration, ils gardent leur fraîcheur sous la pression pour que vous puissiez continuer à bouger.

Caractéristiques:

  • Panneaux perforés pour la respirabilité
  • Ceinture confort hautement extensible
  • Tissu haute performance à séchage rapide
  • Étirement dans 4 directions
  • Poches zippées pour un transport sécurisé
  • Protection solaire UPF 50+
  • Longueur de 7" pour un mouvement optimal

Ajuster:

  • Spacieux au niveau des cuisses et des fessiers pour des mouvements illimités
  • Entrejambe de 7 pouces
  • Taille normalement ; taille au-dessus pour une coupe plus ample
  • 90 % polyester/10 % élasthanne

    Couleurs incluses dans le pack :

    • Noir
    • Carbone

Default content:
Move without limits. These ultra-light training shorts offer maximum comfort and light-as-air breathability through your toughest workouts. Designed with cooling vent panels, 4-way stretch, and an unlined sweat-wicking performance fabric, they keep their cool under pressure so you can keep moving.

 

 Features:    

  • Perforated panels for breathability
  • High-stretch comfort waistband
  • High performance quick-dry fabric
  • 4-way stretch
  • Zippered pockets for a secure carry
  • UPF 50+ sun protection
  • 7” length for optimal movement

Fit: 

  • Roomy in thighs and glutes for limitless movement
  • 7” inseam
  • Fits true to size; size up for a roomier fit
  • 90% Polyester/10% Spandex

    • Navy
    • Sandstone

Default content:
Features:    

  • Premium active joggers.
  • 89% polyester/11% spandex.
  • UPF 30 blocks 97% of UV rays.
  • Provides 4-way stretch for maximum comfort.
  • Peached finish fabric for added softness and comfort.
  • Features side-entry front pockets and single zip back pocket for added security.
  • Custom designed tangle free and easy to tie drawstrings.
  • Fabric will shrink minimally (5%) on a low heat setting in the dryer.
  • Jogger inseam length: 29 in / 73.5 cm.

Fit: 

  • This is a contemporary/athletic cut.

Colors Included in Pack: 

  • Black x 3

Care Instructions:

  • Machine Wash Cold, use non-chlorine Bleach.
  • Tumble dry low, do not Iron.
Translated content:
Caractéristiques:

  • Joggers actifs haut de gamme.
  • 89 % polyester/11 % élasthanne.
  • UPF 30 bloque 97 % des rayons UV.
  • Fournit une extensibilité dans 4 directions pour un confort maximal.
  • Tissu finition pêche pour plus de douceur et de confort.
  • Comprend des poches avant à entrée latérale et une poche arrière zippée unique pour plus de sécurité.
  • Cordons de serrage conçus sur mesure, sans enchevêtrement et faciles à nouer.
  • Le tissu rétrécira légèrement (5 %) à basse température dans la sécheuse.
  • Longueur de l'entrejambe du jogger : 29 po / 73,5 cm.

Ajuster:

  • Il s’agit d’une coupe contemporaine/athlétique.

Couleurs incluses dans le pack :

  • Noir x3

Instructions d'entretien :

  • Lavage en machine à l'eau froide, utilisez un agent de blanchiment sans chlore.
  • Sécher à basse température, ne pas repasser.

Default content:
Finally, a puffer jacket without an overly puffy fit. Lightweight and packable, we designed ours with a perfect, flattering fit that won’t weigh you down while providing superior insulation and warmth. All at an affordable price you can feel warm and fuzzy about.

 

Features:

  • Perfect fit
  • Water-resistant
  • Lightweight and easy to pack
  • Ultra-soft fleece lining on pockets
  • 2 side seam hand pockets with hidden zipper closure
  • Full-zip with double-sided zipper closure (open from top or bottom)
  • 100% Nylon self and lining / 100% Polyester fill

 Fit:

  • Slim fit in arms and shoulders
  • Straight fit in the body for room to layer
  • Size up for a looser fit
  • Model is 6'2" and wearing size M
Translated content:
Enfin une doudoune sans coupe trop bouffante. Léger et compactable, nous avons conçu le nôtre avec une coupe parfaite et flatteuse qui ne vous alourdira pas tout en offrant une isolation et une chaleur supérieures. Le tout à un prix abordable, vous pouvez vous sentir bien et confortablement installé.

 

Caractéristiques:

  • Ajustement parfait
  • Résistant à l'eau
  • Léger et facile à emballer
  • Doublure polaire ultra douce sur les poches
  • 2 poches pour les mains dans les coutures latérales avec fermeture à glissière cachée
  • Fermeture à glissière complète avec fermeture à glissière double face (ouverture par le haut ou par le bas)
  • Composition et doublure 100 % nylon / Remplissage 100 % polyester

Ajuster:

  • Coupe ajustée au niveau des bras et des épaules
  • Coupe droite sur le corps pour laisser de la place pour superposer des couches
  • Taille au-dessus pour une coupe plus ample
  • Le mannequin mesure 6'2" et porte une taille M

Talk to me goose. Inspired by the aviator jacket, this water-resistant bomber brings a perfect fit to an American classic. With a signature high-contrast orange lining and authentic brass zippers, it’s an easy way to add instant style to your look.

 

Features:

  • Perfect fit.
  • Water resistant.
  • Ultra-soft.
  • Classic aviator orange lining.
  • Authentic brass zippers.
  • 2 front hand pockets.
  • 1 zippered pocket on left sleeve.
  • Full-zip with double-sided zipper closure (open from top or bottom).
  • 65% Cotton / 35% Nylon (100% Polyester fill).

 Fit:

  • Slim fit.
  • Fitted in arms and shoulders.
  • Size up for a looser fit.

Warm your core in style. Cold weather and A/C proof, this outerwear essential is the easiest way to look good and feel good when temps drop. Ultra-lightweight and packable, it's perfect fit doesn’t weigh you down and layers easily over your gym clothes, workwear, or a classic crew neck.

 

Features:

  • Perfect fit
  • Water-resistant
  • Lightweight and easy to pack
  • Ultra-soft fleece lining on pockets
  • 2 side seam hand pockets with snap closure
  • Full-zip with double-sided zipper closure (open from top or bottom)
  • 100% Nylon self and lining / 100% Polyester fill

 Fit:

  • Slim fit in arms and shoulders
  • Straight fit at waist for room to layer
  • Size up for a looser fit
  • Model is 6'2" and wearing size M
Translated content:
Réchauffez votre cœur avec style. Résistant au froid et à la climatisation, ce vêtement d'extérieur essentiel est le moyen le plus simple d'avoir fière allure et de se sentir bien lorsque les températures baissent. Ultra léger et compact, son ajustement parfait ne vous alourdit pas et se superpose facilement à vos vêtements de sport, de travail ou à un col rond classique.

 

Caractéristiques:

  • Ajustement parfait
  • Résistant à l'eau
  • Léger et facile à emballer
  • Doublure polaire ultra douce sur les poches
  • 2 poches repose-mains dans les coutures latérales avec fermeture à bouton-pression
  • Fermeture à glissière complète avec fermeture à glissière double face (ouverture par le haut ou par le bas)
  • Composition et doublure 100 % nylon / Remplissage 100 % polyester

 Ajuster:

  • Coupe ajustée au niveau des bras et des épaules
  • Coupe droite à la taille pour laisser de la place à superposer
  • Taille au-dessus pour une coupe plus ample
  • Le mannequin mesure 6'2" et porte une taille M

The coverage and convenience of a hoodie, the performance of your favorite activewear. This breathable lightweight layer brings comfort to your busiest days (and not to mention, a perfect flattering fit for your arms and shoulders).

 

Features:

  • Perfect fit
  • Ultra-soft
  • Quick dry and moisture-wicking
  • 4-way stretch
  • UPF 50+ Sun Protection
  • Deep front hoodie pocket
  • Hood with adjustable drawcord
  • 89% Polyester/ 11% Spandex

 Fit:

  • Slim fit in arms and shoulders
  • Room through the body
  • Size up for looser fit

Colors Included in Pack: 

  • Black
  • Charcoal Heather Gray
Translated content:
La couverture et la commodité d'un sweat à capuche, la performance de vos vêtements de sport préférés. Cette couche légère et respirante apporte du confort lors de vos journées les plus chargées (et sans oublier une coupe parfaitement flatteuse pour vos bras et vos épaules).

 

Caractéristiques:

  • Ajustement parfait
  • Ultra-doux
  • Séchage rapide et évacuation de l'humidité
  • Étirement dans 4 directions
  • Protection solaire UPF 50+
  • Poche profonde à capuche sur le devant
  • Capuche avec cordon de serrage réglable
  • 89 % polyester/ 11 % élasthanne

Ajuster:

  • Coupe ajustée au niveau des bras et des épaules
  • Espace à travers le corps
  • Taille au-dessus pour une coupe plus ample

Couleurs incluses dans le pack :

  • Noir
  • Charbon Gris Chiné

Default content:
Warm your core in style. Cold weather and A/C proof, this outerwear essential is the easiest way to look good and feel good when temps drop. Ultra-lightweight and packable, it's perfect fit doesn’t weigh you down and layers easily over your gym clothes, workwear, or a classic crew neck.

 

Features:

  • Perfect fit
  • Water-resistant
  • Lightweight and easy to pack
  • Ultra-soft fleece lining on pockets
  • 2 side seam hand pockets with snap closure
  • Full-zip with double-sided zipper closure (open from top or bottom)
  • 100% Nylon self and lining / 100% Polyester fill

 Fit:

  • Slim fit in arms and shoulders
  • Straight fit at waist for room to layer
  • Size up for a looser fit
  • Model is 6'2" and wearing size M

Colors Included in Pack: 

  • Black
  • Navy
  • Gunmetal
Translated content:
Réchauffez votre cœur avec style. Résistant au froid et à la climatisation, ce vêtement d'extérieur essentiel est le moyen le plus simple d'avoir fière allure et de se sentir bien lorsque les températures baissent. Ultra léger et compact, son ajustement parfait ne vous alourdit pas et se superpose facilement à vos vêtements de sport, de travail ou à un col rond classique.

 

Caractéristiques:

  • Ajustement parfait
  • Résistant à l'eau
  • Léger et facile à emballer
  • Doublure polaire ultra douce sur les poches
  • 2 poches repose-mains dans les coutures latérales avec fermeture à bouton-pression
  • Fermeture à glissière complète avec fermeture à glissière double face (ouverture par le haut ou par le bas)
  • Composition et doublure 100 % nylon / Remplissage 100 % polyester

 Ajuster:

  • Coupe ajustée au niveau des bras et des épaules
  • Coupe droite à la taille pour laisser de la place à superposer
  • Taille au-dessus pour une coupe plus ample
  • Le mannequin mesure 6'2" et porte une taille M

Couleurs incluses dans le pack :

  • Noir
  • Marine
  • Bronze à canon

Translated content: Pack de 3 gilets matelassés essentiels | Pack de 3 gilets matelassés essentiels | Un vrai classique

Default content:
No fuss, no frills – this ultra-soft sweater offers the added coverage of a hoodie with a perfect fit and clean polish that goes with, well, everything.

 

Features:

  • Perfect fit
  • Ultra-soft
  • Ribbed cuffs and bottom band
  • Hoodie without drawcords
  • 72% Polyester/24% Rayon/4% Spandex

 Fit:

  • Athletic fit with room to layer
  • Fitted in arms and shoulders
  • Size down for a slimmer fit
  • Model is 6'2" and wearing size M

Colors Included in Pack: 

  • Black
  • Heather Oatmeal
  • Heather Gray
Translated content:
Pas de chichi, pas de fioritures : ce pull ultra doux offre la couverture supplémentaire d'un sweat à capuche avec une coupe parfaite et un vernis épuré qui va avec tout.

  • Ajustement parfait
  • Ultra-doux
  • Poignets et bande inférieure côtelés
  • Sweat à capuche sans cordons
  • 72 % polyester/24 % rayonne/4 % élasthanne

 Ajuster:

  • Coupe athlétique avec espace pour superposer
  • Ajusté aux bras et aux épaules
  • Taille en dessous pour une coupe plus fine
  • Le mannequin mesure 6'2" et porte une taille M

Couleurs incluses dans le pack :

  • Noir
  • Gruau de bruyère
  • Gris chiné

No bunching, no riding up. With a ridiculously soft micromodal fabric and innovative flyless 3D pouch for maximum support, you’ll never want to go commando again. Our favorite part? Its stretchy, ultra-comfortable elastic waistband that won’t dig or slip.

 

Feature:

  • Modern, flattering fit
  • Ultra-soft 
  • Screen-printed no-itch tag
  • Flyless 3D pouch constructed separately from the body with two seams around the crotch and one in the center for support
  • 92% micromodal / 8% elastane

Fit:

  • Form fitting with plenty of room to stretch
  • Stretchy elastane waistband
  • S: 30” waist - 3 1/2" inseam
  • M: 33” waist - 3 3/4" inseam
  • L: 36” waist - 3 7/8" inseam
  • XL: 40” waist - 4" inseam
  • 2XL: 44” waist - 4 1/8" inseam

      Colors Included in Pack:

      • Carbon x 12

Fonctionnalité:

  • Coupe moderne et flatteuse
  • Ultra-doux
  • Étiquette anti-démangeaison sérigraphiée
  • Pochette 3D sans mouche construite séparément du corps avec deux coutures autour de l'entrejambe et une au centre pour le soutien
  • 92% micromodal / 8% élasthanne

Ajuster:

  • Water resistant
  • Ultra-soft
  • Mid-weight warmth

Weather happens. When it does, you’ll want the perfect fit of our puffer with the added, functional features you can’t live without. This hooded puffer is the quintessential winter wardrobe staple on the top of every guy’s wishlist, at a price you can feel all warm and fuzzy about.


Features:

  • Perfect fit
  • Water resistant
  • Ultra-soft
  • Mid-weight warmth 
  • Interior chest pocket with zipper closure
  • 2 front hand pockets with zipper closure
  • 100% Nylon (Shell & Lining) / 100% Polyester Fill

Fit:

  • Slim through shoulders and arms
  • Room through the body
  • Size up for a looser fit

Colors Included in Pack: 

  • Black
  • Gunmetal
Translated content:
Le temps arrive. Lorsque cela se produira, vous souhaiterez l'ajustement parfait de notre doudoune avec les fonctionnalités supplémentaires et fonctionnelles dont vous ne pourrez pas vous passer. Cette doudoune à capuche est l'incontournable de la garde-robe d'hiver par excellence en tête de la liste de souhaits de tous les hommes, à un prix qui vous permettra de vous sentir tout chaud et flou.


Caractéristiques:

  • Ajustement parfait
  • Résistant à l'eau
  • Ultra-doux
  • Chaleur moyenne
  • Poche poitrine intérieure avec fermeture éclair
  • 2 poches avant avec fermeture éclair
  • 100 % nylon (extérieur et doublure) / rembourrage 100 % polyester.

Ajuster:

  • Mince au niveau des épaules et des bras
  • Espace à travers le corps
  • Taille au-dessus pour une coupe plus ample

Couleurs incluses dans le pack :

  • Noir
  • Bronze à canon

Refund policy Return & Exchange Policy  

Thanks for shopping with True Classic.  We’re confident you’ll love your purchase, but in the event that you aren’t 100% satisfied, we’re here to assist.   You can always reach out to our customer support team at support@trueclassictees.com at any time, or through live chat during business hours.   The below Return and Exchange policy will provide the context in which you are eligible for a return on your order.

How many days do I have to return or exchange an item?

All US and Canada orders are eligible for a return or exchange of any item within 30 days of purchase, with the exception of items marked as Final Sale (those Final Sale items will NOT be eligible for a return or exchange).  All items must be unworn, unwashed, unaltered, and returned in their original packaging.  

How do I request a return? 

Please submit your return request below. We will provide a pre-paid return shipping label. For damaged/defective items please contact us directly. trueclassictees.happyreturns.com   What if I received a damaged or defective item?  Please contact our support team at support@trueclassictees.com and we will take care of you right away. If I am exchanging an item, when will I receive my exchange?  Once your return tracking is updated, our automated system will process your replacement exchange order. You will receive an automated email when your exchange has been processed. 

If I am returning an item for a refund, when will I receive my refund? For how much will the refund be?

Once your return tracking is updated, our automated system will process your refund and credit your original payment method.  Please allow 3-5 business days for your refund to be processed by your bank. We will refund you for all items that are returned, less the original cost of shipping.

Will you provide me with a shipping label?

Yes, we will provide a prepaid shipping label for all returns and exchanges. What if I entered the wrong address? While we are limited to changes on an order, we will make every effort to fix this if the order has not yet been prepared for shipment.  Please contact us immediately. We will also make every effort to get your order to you. You may, however, be responsible for shipping costs for the reshipment of your item(s).

What if I am a Canadian customer?

The above policy applies to Canadian customers as well.  Please keep in mind that we are unable to refund any duties or taxes.

What if I have additional questions?

For any further questions regarding our Return Policy, please reach out to our customer service team at support@trueclassictees.com at any time, or through live chat during business hours.  We look forward to helping.

Effective March 18, 2022

 

By using True Classic Tees LLC’s Services, by visiting trueclassictees.com, or by otherwise purchasing products therefrom, you accept and agree to the terms of this privacy policy (the “Privacy Policy”), and consent to our collection, use, disclosure, retention, and protection of personal information as described herein.

True Classic Tees LLC (referred to herein as “True Classic Tees”, “we”, “our”, or “us”), values and respects your privacy rights and recognizes the importance of protecting your information. This Privacy Policy explains what personal data we collect from you, how we use it, and options you have with respect to your own information.

This Privacy Policy is incorporated by reference by the True Classic Tees Terms of Use (https://trueclassictees.com/policies/terms-of-service) and is subject to the terms therein.

 

  1. SCOPE.
    1. This Privacy Policy applies to the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information by us through the Services. This Privacy Policy does not apply to any information not collected through the Services.
    2. "Personal information" is information that can be associated with a specific person and could be used to identify that specific person whether from that data or from that data and other information that True Classic Tees has or is likely to have access to. We do not consider personal information to include information that has been made anonymous, pseudonymous, or aggregated so that it can no longer be used to identify a specific person, whether in combination with other information or otherwise.
    3. "Services" means the goods and services that True Classic Tees sells to the general public, including its websites (e.g. trueclassictees.com) and the goods and services sold on its websites.
  2. COLLECTION.
    1. How We Collect. We may collect personal information from you when you use or access our Services, including but not limited to, when you sign up for the Services or when you otherwise correspond with us in connection with your use of the Services.
    2. What We Collect. The personal information we collect includes, but is not limited to, the following:
      • Identifying Information such as your name, shipping address, phone numbers, e-mail address, device IDs, third party user IDs, and other unique identifiers;
      • Financial Information such as your bank account and payment card information;
      • Electronic Network Activity Information such as usage statistics, page views, referral URLs, your IP address, web log information, device information, browser settings, and information collected via cookies and similar technologies; Trueclassictees.com uses cookies to help keep track of items you put into your shopping cart including when you have abandoned your cart and this information is used to determine when to send cart reminder messages via SMS.
      • Order Information such as your order billing and shipment address and payment information;
      • Commercial Information, such as your service subscription history;
      • Geolocation Data such as postal address zip code; and
      • Inferences such as information based on how you use and interact with the services.
  3. USE, RETENTION, AND CORRECTIONS.
    1. How We Use Personal Information. Personal information you provide will be used to provide and improve the Services and to personalize the Services for you. This includes, but is not limited to: (1) displaying our website(s) or app(s) to you, (2) recommending products or services, product search, and other shopping or ecommerce services, (3) order processing, shipping, and fulfillment, (4) payment for Services, (5) customer service (including refunds and returns), (6) corresponding with you, (7) protecting the integrity and operation of our computers, our network, our payment systems, or the Services (such as when screening orders for fraud), (8) or to provide you with information (such about our products), marketing, or advertising relating to our products and Services.
    2. Third Party Usage.  The personal information that we collect and information about your order may be combined with other personal information (such as demographic information and past purchase history) available from our records and other sources. This information may be used to make our future marketing efforts more efficient. This information may also be shared with our third party service providers that assist us with our marketing efforts and with other marketers whose products or services we think may be of interest to you. If you prefer that we do not share your name and address with other marketers, please email us at info@trueclassictees.com or use the “Do Not Sell or Share My Information” form on our website.
    3. Duration of Retention. We will keep personal information you provide as long as there is a reasonable basis to do so, whether to enforce any relevant law, the provisions of any agreement, to resolve any past, current, or future dispute, or any other business, tax, or legal purpose. When we dispose of personal information, we will do so in a secure manner.
    4. Corrections. You may request correction of any personal information that is incorrect by contacting us at support@trueclassictees.com
  4. YOUR CHOICES.
    1. You May Decline to Provide Information. You may decline to submit personal information and/or disable webpage cookies.
    2. Effect of Declining to Provide Information. If you decline to submit personal information or any portion thereof, you may experience materially reduced Services quality. However, you acknowledge and agree that any resulting inability to provide the Services, or any resulting degradation thereof, shall not be grounds for any claim of breach, damages, or other liability; nor shall it in any way relieve you of your obligations to True Classic Tees.
    3. You May Request Your Personal Information. You may request that True Classic Tees provide you with a copy of your personal information it has stored about you.  To do so, please email info@trueclassictees.com with your request.  True Classic Tees may take up to 30 days to provide the personal information to you.
    4. You May Request Deletion of Personal Information. You may request that True Classic Tees modify or delete personal information it has stored about you. However, you acknowledge and agree that doing so shall relieve and release True Classic Tees from any liability, obligation, claim, or other damages related to or arising from said personal information.
  5. LEVEL OF SECURITY.
    1. How Secure It Is. True Classic Tees shall use commercially reasonable measures in line with industry standards to protect your information, including but not limited to electronic and administrative safeguards designed to help make personal information secure. We will make reasonable attempts to provide you with notice in the event of a security breach.
  6. DISCLOSURE.
    1. When Will We Disclose Personal Information. We may share personal information with third-parties when necessary to provide the Services (such as to our vendors or to our advertising partners).
      We may share personal information when we have a good faith belief it is necessary by law or to respond to legal process, to protect the safety and lives of people, to protect the rights or property of True Classic Tees, in response to lawful requests by public authorities, including to meet national security or law enforcement requirements, and with your consent. “The above excludes text messaging originator opt-in data and consent; this information will not be shared with any third parties.”
    2. Disclosure to Vendors. True Classic Tees may use the services of other companies in order to provide the Services. Such companies shall be given only the personal information needed to perform those services, and we do not authorize them to use or disclose personal information for their own marketing or other purposes. We have contracts in place holding such companies to the same standards of confidentiality by which True Classic Tees is governed. True Classic Tees shall make commercially reasonable efforts to enforce such terms on such companies. However, True Classic Tees shall not be liable to you for such companies failure to adhere to such confidentiality terms.
      For example, we use Shopify to power our online store -- you can read more about how Shopify uses your Personal Information here: https://www.shopify.com/legal/privacy. We also use Google Analytics to help us understand how our customers use the Site -- you can read more about how Google uses your Personal Information here:
      https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/privacy/
      You can also opt-out of Google Analytics here: https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout
    3. Behavioral Advertising. As described above, we use your Personal Information to provide you with targeted advertisements or marketing communications we believe may be of interest to you. Such targeted advertisements or marketing communications may include advertisements for True Classic Tees based on your product search or viewing history, products placed in your online cart, or your Services purchase history. For more information about how targeted advertising works, you can visit the Network Advertising Initiative’s (“NAI”) educational page at: http://www.networkadvertising.org/understanding-online-advertising/how-does-it-work.

      You can opt out of targeted advertising by using the links below:
      Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/settings/?tab=ads
      Google: https://www.google.com/settings/ads/anonymous
      Bing: https://advertise.bingads.microsoft.com/en-us/resources/policies/personalized-ads

      Additionally, you can opt out of some of these services by visiting the Digital Advertising Alliance’s opt-out portal at: http://optout.aboutads.info/.
  7. ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES: CALIFORNIA
    1. California Residents. Under the California Consumer Privacy Act (as amended by the California Privacy Rights Act), or CCPA, California residents have certain rights regarding their data, including:
      • To know the categories of personal information collected and disclosed and the sources from which such information was collected (see Section 2.2);
      • The business purpose for using or sharing personal information (see Section 3.1);
      • The categories of third parties with whom personal information has been and will be disclosed (see Section 6.2); and
      • The ability to know and delete certain pieces of personal information (see below and Section 4).
    2. Right to Know and Right to Delete. If you are a California resident, you shall also have the right to know the specific pieces of personal information that True Classic Tees has about you; and to have True Classic Tees delete said pieces of personal information at your request.
    3. Do Not Sell. If you are a California resident, you may prevent the transfer of personal information to any third-party for consideration at the following “Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information” page:https://trueclassictees.com/pages/ccpa-compliance
    4. Requests. Requests to know, requests to delete, and follow-up correspondence to requests to opt out may be sent to support@trueclassictees.com]; or via the webform at the following link:https://trueclassictees.com/pages/ccpa-compliance
  8. ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES: EU RESIDENTS
    1. Right to Know, Correct, Update, and Delete. If you are a resident of the EU, you shall have the right to know the specific pieces of personal information that True Classic Tees has about you; and to have True Classic Tees correct, update, and/or delete said pieces of personal information at your request.
    2. Requests. Requests to know, correct, update, and/or delete, may be sent to support@trueclassictees.com; or via the webform at the following link: https://trueclassictees.com/pages/ccpa-compliance
  9. OTHER.
    1. Correcting Personal Information. You agree to notify True Classic Tees of personal information that you are aware has errors.
    2. Do Not Track. Please note that we do not alter our Site’s data collection and use practices when we see a Do Not Track signal from your browser.
    3. Changes. We reserve the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy at any time. Your continued use of our Services will signify your acceptance of any changes to our Privacy Policy.
      If there is a substantive or material change in the way that we use personal information, we will notify you via email of the relevant changes or provide other prominent notice. Changes to the Privacy Policy will go into effect five (5) business days after notice of the change is posted on our website(s).
    4. Third-Parties. This Privacy Policy applies to True Classic Tees’ use of personal information, but does not apply to the activities of any third-party. If you disclose personal information to others, whether as a result of any transaction on the Application or via the Services, or ad-click, or otherwise, their privacy policies and practices will apply. True Classic Tees shall not be liable or in any way otherwise responsible for any use of personal information by such third-parties.
    5. Contact Us. If you have any questions, concerns, or complaints related to or regarding the above please contact us at support@trueclassictees.com or at:
              True Classic Tees
              Attention: Privacy
              26635 Agoura Rd. Suite 201,
              Calabasas 91302

SECTION 2 - GENERAL CONDITIONS
